DataElement.preferredName: First Brachial Systolic Blood Pressure Oscillometric Result Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the result of a first brachial systolic blood pressure measurement using an oscillometric device on the arm used for the mercury sphygmomanometer measurement, with the subject in a supine position.  Cuff placement, sizing, subject instructions during the procedure and timing of measurements are conducted according to ARIC Protocol 11 for sitting Blood pressure and postural changes.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: First of sequential brachial systolic blood pressure measurements, using an oscillometric device on the arm used for the mercury sphygmomanometer measurement, with the subject in a supine position.  Cuff placement, sizing, subject instructions during the procedure and timing of measurements are conducted according to ARIC Protocol 11 for sitting Blood pressure and postural changes.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:The continuation of the axillary artery; it branches into the radial and ulnar arteries.:the blood pressure during the contraction of the left ventricle of the heart.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
The continuation of the axillary artery; it branches into the radial and ulnar arteries.
the blood pressure during the contraction of the left ventricle of the heart.

Property.preferredDefinition: Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.

Concepts.definition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the result of a blood pressure measurement using an oscillometric (Dinamap) device.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/07-OK to removed "diastolic and systolic" from definition to support reuse in both types of BP per Jennie Larkin.

DataElement.changeDescription: CDE based on the ABI manual specifications for the ARIC study.
